Course Update: 19 June 2015 - New Content Added

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

So, you want to grow your business on Social Media?

Do you find Social Media confusing? Baffling? Irrelevant? If you want to understand how Social Media works and what it can do to help you grow your business then this Course is for you.

But you want to minimise the effort - creating all that content for all those platforms? Takes ages and you don't know what is going to work!

What this Course will give you!

  • Show you how to identify your Audience and where to find them
  • We will help you understand how Social Media works and how to get the most out of it
  • My Social Media Manifesto will show you how to be effective in Social Media
  • Discover the Social Media Landscape
  • Understand that Social Media comprises Multi-Media and learn how to Harness it
  • Really understand how to make your Content Strategy work with your Social Media Strategy
  • Discover the magic of Content Repurposing to get more exposure from the same original content

In a series of short videos (circa 5 minutes each), supported by downloadable PDFs of the Slidedecks, I talk you through Social Media Strategy in a clear, logical and highly structured way.

This Course has been distilled from a 3 hour Seminar programme that I teach to give you the essentials of Social Media Strategy in 13 Videos lasting just over 55 minutes.

If Social Media is new to you, then this Course will explain many of the concepts and features of Social Media to give you the foundations to establish your own Social Media Strategy.

Certificate of Completion

All Students who complete this course will receive a Free digital certificate of completion from Udemy.

No Quibble Money Back Guarantee

Don't forget I fully endorse Udemy's 30 Day Money Back Guarantee - if you are not happy, your money back and no hard feelings on my part! I have never argued about a refund.

CLICK THE TAKE THIS COURSE BUTTON NOW - ENROL TODAY

Find out what Social Media and Content Management when done strategically can do for your business!
title: Social Media Strategy How to Excel At Content Marketing
